tika-s0305t11:3_1: yathāgatādivasena. Yathābhūtaṁ nāma imasmiṁ sutte “samāhito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathābhūtaṁ
tika-s0305t11:3_2: pajānātī”tiādi. Ādi-saddena “tathā yasmā”tiādisaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi yathābhūtavasena
tika-s0305t11:3_3: kāraṇacchedo kato “tathā yasmā”tiādivacanehi. Vaṇṇāti akkharā, “guṇā”ti keci. Padabyañjanānīti
tika-s0305t11:5_0: 1073-75.Sāsanāvacarā adhippetā bāhirakānaṁ saccābhisamayassa abhāvato. Tathāti iminā
tika-s0305t11:5_1: catutthapañcamesu atthavisesābhāvaṁ dasseti. Yadi evaṁ kasmā visuṁ visuṁ desanāti
tika-s0305t11:7_0: 1080. Duggatito saṁsārato ca niyyāti etenāti niyyānaṁ, saggamaggo mokkhamaggo ca.
tika-s0305t11:7_1: Tasmiṁ niyyāne niyuttā, taṁ ettha atthīti niyyānikā. Vacīduccaritasaṁkilesato vā
tika-s0305t11:7_2: niyyātīti ī-kārassa rassattaṁ ya-kārassa ka-kāraṁ katvā niyyānikā. Cetanāya saddhiṁ
tika-s0305t11:7_3: samphappalāpā veramaṇi. Tappaṭipakkhato aniyyānikā, tassa bhāvo aniyyānikattaṁ. Tiracchānabhūtanti
tika-s0305t11:8_0: Visikhāti gharasanniveso. Visikhāgahaṇena ca gāmādigahaṇe viya tannivāsino visesato
tika-s0305t11:8_1: gahitā “āgato gāmo”tiādīsu viya. Tenāha “sūrā samatthā”ti. Kumbhaṭṭhānāpadesena kumbhadāsiyo
tika-s0305t11:8_2: vuttāti āha – “kumbhadāsikathā”ti. Ayāthāvato uppattiṭṭhitisaṁhārādivasena loko akkhāyati
tika-s0305t11:8_3: etenāti lokakkhāyikā. Iti iminā pakārena bhavo, iminā abhavoti evaṁ pavattāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṁ.
tika-s0305t11:12: 1081.“Isīnaṁ patanuppatanavasena osīdanauppatanaṭṭhānavasena evaṁ ‘isipatana’nti ‘laddhanāme’ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṁ vivarituṁ ‘ettha hī”’tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:13_0: Āmantesīti ettha yasmā dhammacakkappavattanatthaṁ ayaṁ āmantanā, tasmā samudāgamato
tika-s0305t11:13_1: paṭṭhāya satthu pubbacaritaṁ saṅkhepeneva pakāsetuṁ vaṭṭatīti “dīpaṅkarapādamūle
tika-s0305t11:13_2: katābhinīhārato paṭṭhāyā”tiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha mārabalaṁ bhinditvāti mārañca mārabalañca
tika-s0305t11:13_3: bhañjitvā. Atha vā mārassa abbhantaraṁ bāhirañcāti duvidhaṁ balaṁ bhañjitvā. “Dveme,
tika-s0305t11:13_4: bhikkhave, antā”ti ettha anta-saddo “pubbante ñāṇaṁ aparante ñāṇa”ntiādīsu viya bhāgapariyāyoti
tika-s0305t11:13_5: āha “dve ime, bhikkhave, koṭṭhāsā”ti. Saha samudāhārenāti uccāraṇasamakālaṁ. Pattharitvā
tika-s0305t11:13_6: aṭṭhāsi buddhānubhāvena. Brahmāno samāgacchiṁsu paripakkakusalamūlā saccābhisambodhāya katādhikārā.
tika-s0305t11:14_0: Gihisaññojananti gihibandhanaṁ. Chinditvāti haritvā. Na vaḷañjetabbāti nānuyuñjetabbā.
tika-s0305t11:14_1: Kilesakāmasukhassāti kilesakāmayuttassa sukhassa. Anuyogoti anubhavo. Gāmavāsīhi
tika-s0305t11:14_2: sevitabbattā gāmavāsīnaṁ santako. Attanoti attabhāvassa. Āhito ahaṁmāno etthāti attā,
tika-s0305t11:14_3: attabhāvo. Dukkhakaraṇanti dukkhuppādanaṁ. Attamāraṇehīti attabādhanehi. Upasamāyāti
tika-s0305t11:14_4: kilesavūpasamo adhippeto, tadatthasampadānavacananti āha “kilesūpasamatthāyā”ti. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0305t11:15_0: Saccañāṇādivasena tayo parivaṭṭā etassāti tiparivaṭṭaṁ, ñāṇadassanaṁ. Tenāha “saccañāṇā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t11:15_1: Yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇanti paṭivedhañāṇaṁ āha. Tesuyeva saccesu. Ñāṇena kattabbassa ca pariññāpaṭivedhādikiccassa
tika-s0305t11:15_2: ca jānanañāṇaṁ, “tañca kho paṭivedhato pagevā”ti keci. Pacchāti apare. Tathā katañāṇaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:16_0: Paṭivedhañāṇampi desanāñāṇampi dhammacakkanti idaṁ tattha ñāṇakiccaṁ padhānanti katvā
tika-s0305t11:16_1: vuttaṁ. Saddhindriyādidhammasamudāyo pana pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:16_2: Atha vā cakkanti āṇā, dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṁ cakkañca, dhammena ñāyena
tika-s0305t11:16_3: cakkantipi dhammacakkaṁ. Yathāha “dhammañca pavatteti cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṁ, cakkañca
tika-s0305t11:16_4: pavatteti dhammañcāti dhammacakkaṁ, dhammena pavattatīti dhammacakkaṁ, dhammacariyāya
tika-s0305t11:16_5: pavattatīti dhammacakka”ntiādi. Ubhayampīti paṭivedhañāṇaṁ desanāñāṇanti ubhayampi.
tika-s0305t11:16_6: Etanti tadubhayaṁ. Imāya desanāyāti iminā suttena pakāsentena bhagavatā yathāvuttañāṇadvayasaṅkhātaṁ
tika-s0305t11:16_7: dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ nāma pavattanakiccassa aniṭṭhitattā. Patiṭṭhiteti aññāsi
tika-s0305t11:16_8: koṇḍaññattherena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhite. Pavattitaṁ nāma kassapasammāsambuddhassa
tika-s0305t11:16_9: sāsanantaradhānato paṭṭhāya yāva buddhuppādo, ettakaṁ kālaṁ appavattapubbassa pavattitattā,
tika-s0305t11:17_0: Ekappahārenāti ekeneva pahārasaññitena kālena. Divasassa hi tatiyo bhāgo pahāro nāma.
tika-s0305t11:17_1: Pāḷiyaṁ pana “tena khaṇena tena layena tena muhuttenā”ti vuttaṁ. Taṁ pahārakkhaṇasallakkhaṇameva.
tika-s0305t11:17_2: Sabbaññutaññāṇobhāsoti sabbaññutaññāṇānubhāvena pavatto obhāso cittaṁ paṭicca utusamuṭṭhāno
tika-s0305t11:17_3: veditabbo. Yasmā bhagavato dhammacakkappavattanassa ārambhe viya parisamāpane ativiya
tika-s0305t11:17_4: uḷāratamaṁ pītisomanassaṁ udapādi, tasmā “imassapi udānassā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:19_0: 1089. Atthasaṁvaṇṇane vaṇṇīyanteti vaṇṇā. Teyeva pariyāyena akkharaṇato akkharāni.
tika-s0305t11:19_1: Atthaṁ byañjentīti byañjanāni. Yasmā pana akārādike sarasamaññā, kakārādike byañjanasamaññā,
tika-s0305t11:19_2: ubhayattha vaṇṇasamaññā, tasmā vuttaṁ “vaṇṇānaṁ vā ekadesā yadidaṁ byañjanā nāmā”ti.
tika-s0305t11:19_3: Nettiyaṁ pana vākye byañjanasamaññā. Byañjanaggahaṇeneva cettha ākāraniruttiniddesā
tika-s0305t11:19_4: gahitā evāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Saṅkāsanāti atthassa ñāpanā bhāgaso. Tenāha “vibhattiyo”ti.
tika-s0305t11:19_5: Saṅkāsanaggahaṇeneva cettha pakāsanā vuttā hoti. Vibhattiyo hi atthavacaneneva vivaranti,
tika-s0305t11:19_6: tāhi kāraṇapaññattiyo vuttāyevāti, tāhipi atthapadāni gahitāneva honti. Ayamettha
tika-s0305t11:19_7: saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimaggavaṇṇanāyaṁ nettiaṭṭhakathāyañca vuttanayena
tika-s0305t11:19_8: veditabbo. Sabbākārenāti sabhāgādivibhāvanākārena. Vaṇṇādīnanti tasmiṁ pana vitthāre
tika-s0305t11:19_9: pavattavaṇṇādīnaṁ. Tasmāti vaṇṇādīnaṁ antaabhāvato. Evamāhāti “aparimāṇā vaṇṇā byañjanā
tika-s0305t11:21_1: Tenāha “dukkhañhi dukkhameva vutta”nti. Sabhāvassāti dukkhasabhāvassa. Amoghatāyāti
tika-s0305t11:21_2: avañjhatāya. Avitathanti na vitathaṁ. Tenāha “na hi dukkhaṁ adukkhaṁ nāma hotī”ti.
tika-s0305t11:21_3: Aññabhāvānupagamenāti samudayādisabhāvānupagamanena musā na hotīti añño aññathā na
tika-s0305t11:25: 1091.Ananubodhāti paṭivedhassa anurūpabodhābhāvena. Appaṭivedhāti saccānaṁ paṭimukhaṁ vedhābhāvena.
tika-s0305t11:31: 1098.Paṭividdhattā desitattā cāti iminā paṭivedhañāṇena desanāñāṇena ca pariggahitattā ariyasantakāni honti ariyassa bhagavato santakabhāvato.
tika-s0305t11:33: 1100.Ekappaṭivedhoti ekeneva ñāṇena catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ ekajjhaṁ paṭivedho.
tika-s0305t11:39: 1105.Bhaveyyaceti dukkhadomanassāni ajjhupekkhitvā sahitehi tehi saccābhisamayo bhaveyyāti evaṁ parikappanā na kātabbāti.
tika-s0305t11:41_0: 1109.Ajjhāsayanti sassatādibhedaṁ ajjhāsayaṁ. So hi “idameva saccaṁ moghamañña”nti
tika-s0305t11:41_1: gāhassa mukhabhūtattā mukhanti adhippeto. Tañca apare adiṭṭhasaccā olokenti, diṭṭhasaccā pana neva olokenti.
tika-s0305t11:43: 1110.Kukkuko pamāṇamajjhimassa purisassa hatthoti attho. Kukkūti tasseva nāmaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:47_1: cittanti attho. Nāḷikerādayoti ādi-saddena avuttānaṁ osadhitiṇavanappatiādīnaṁ saṅgaho.
tika-s0305t11:48_0: Vigatacittoti attatthaparatthato apagatavitakko addasa evaṁ adhiṭṭhahiṁsūti sambandho.
tika-s0305t11:48_1: Sambarimāyanti sambarena asurindena uppāditaṁ asuramāyaṁ, yaṁ “indajāla”ntipi vuccati
tika-s0305t11:48_2: indassa mohanatthaṁ uppāditattā. Samparivattetvāti paridhāvetvā. Yathā neti ne asure
tika-s0305t11:48_3: yathā so puriso passati, evaṁ adhiṭṭhahiṁsu. Kasmā panete evaṁ adhiṭṭhahiṁsūti? Taṁ
tika-s0305t11:48_4: purisaṁ tattha tathānisinnaṁ disvā “ayañca devo”ti āsaṅkantā tathā adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-s0305t11:48_5: bhisamuḷālachiddehi pavisitvā attano asurabhavanaṁ gatā. Tenāha bhagavā – “devānaṁyeva mohayamānā”ti.
tika-s0305t11:50_1: Aniṭṭharūpanti ettha rūpa-saddo sabhāvattho “piyarūpe sātarūpe”tiādīsu viyāti āha
tika-s0305t11:52_0: 1115.Upāsananti ācariyaupāsanaṁ, ācariyaṁ antevāsinā vā divase divase sikkhanavasena
tika-s0305t11:52_1: upāsitabbato upāsananti laddhanāmaṁ kaṇḍakhipanasippaṁ. Kaṇḍaṁ atikkamanteti saraṁ
tika-s0305t11:52_2: khipante. Poṅkhānupoṅkhanti poṅkhasaddatthaṁ pākaṭaṁ katvā dassetuṁ “ekaṁ kaṇḍaṁ
tika-s0305t11:52_3: khipitvā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Aparaṁ anupoṅkhanti ettha aparanti tatiyakaṇḍaṁ. Anupoṅkhaṁ
tika-s0305t11:52_4: nāma idanti dassetuṁ “anupoṅkhaṁ nāma dutiyassa poṅkha”nti vuttaṁ. Tañhi tatiyena
tika-s0305t11:52_5: sarena vijjhīyati. Puna aparaṁ tassa poṅkhanti idaṁ pana aparāparaṁ avirajjhanaṁ
tika-s0305t11:52_6: dassetuṁ vuttaṁ. Durabhisambhavataranti abhibhavituṁ asakkuṇeyyataraṁ. Vālanti kesaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:52_7: Sattadhā bhinditvāti sattakkhattuṁ viphāletvā. Tassa ekaṁ bhedanti tassa kesassa
tika-s0305t11:52_8: ekaṁ aṁsusaṅkhātaṁ bhedaṁ gahetvā. Vātiṅgaṇamajjhe bandhitvāti vātiṅgaṇaphalassa
tika-s0305t11:52_9: majjhaṭṭhāne bandhitvā. Aparaṁ bhedanti aparaṁ kesassa aṁsusaṅkhātaṁ bhedaṁ. Aggakoṭiyaṁ
tika-s0305t11:52_10: bandhitvāti yathā tassa vālabhedassa ūkāmattaṁ likhāmattaṁ vā kaṇḍassa aggakoṭiṁ
tika-s0305t11:52_11: adhikaṁ hutvā tiṭṭhati, evaṁ bandhitvā. Usabhamatteti vīsatiyaṭṭhimatte ṭhāne ṭhito.
tika-s0305t11:52_12: Kaṇḍabaddhāya koṭiyāti kaṇḍabaddhāya vālassa koṭiyā vātiṅgaṇabandhanavālassa koṭiṁ paṭivijjheyya.
tika-s0305t11:54_1: Chiggaḷuparīti heṭṭhimayugassa chiggaḷapadesassa upari. Āruḷhassa chiggaḷenāti ubhinnampi
tika-s0305t11:54_2: chiddena. Gīvappavesanaṁ viyāti catunnaṁ yugānaṁ chiddapadeseneva uparūpari ṭhitānaṁ
tika-s0305t11:54_3: chiddantarena kāṇakacchapassa gīvappavesanaṁ adhiccatarasambhavaṁ. Tatopi adhiccatarasambhavo
tika-s0305t11:54_4: manussattalābho, tato adhiccatamasambhavo ariyamaggapaṭilābhoti dassento āha “catusaccapaṭivedho
tika-s0305t11:57: 1121.Abhisamayasaṁyuttevitthāritova, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva tassa attho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t11:62_0: 1134.Piṭṭhasurāti piṭṭhena kātabbasurā, tathā odanasurā pūvasurā, majjarasādibhūte
tika-s0305t11:62_1: kiṇṇe pakkhipitvā kattabbā surā kiṇṇapakkhittasurā. Sambhārasaṁyuttāti mūlabhesajjasambhārehi
tika-s0305t11:62_2: saṁyuttā. Pupphāsavoti nāḷikerapupphādito assavanakaāsavo. Muddikaphalādito assavanakaāsavo
tika-s0305t11:62_3: phalāsavo. Itītiādiattho. Tena madhvāsavaguḷāsavasambhārasaṁyutte saṅgaṇhāti. Surāsavavinimuttanti
tika-s0305t11:67_0: 1148. “Mūlabīja”ntiādīsu mūlameva bījanti mūlabījaṁ, mūlabījaṁ etassātipi mūlabījaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:67_1: Tattha purimena bījagāmo vutto “bījānaṁ samūho”ti katvā, dutiyena bhūtagāmo. Duvidhopeso
tika-s0305t11:67_2: sāmaññaniddesena, “mūlabījañca mūlabījañca mūlabīja”nti ekasesanayena vā bījattho
tika-s0305t11:67_3: veditabbo. Esa nayo sesesupi. Phaḷubījanti pabbabījaṁ. Bāhirapaccayantarasamavāye
tika-s0305t11:67_4: sadisaphaluppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato viruhanasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bīja-saddo.
tika-s0305t11:67_5: Tadatthasiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti tato nivattanatthaṁ ekena bīja-saddena
tika-s0305t11:67_6: visesetvā vuttaṁ “bījabīja”nti “rūparūpaṁ, dukkhadukkha”nti ca yathā. Nīlatiṇarukkhādikassāti
tika-s0305t11:67_7: allatiṇassa ceva allarukkhādikassa ca. Ādi-saddena osadhigacchalatādīnaṁ gahaṇaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:69: 1149. Aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhiko, ayaṁ buddhādiariyānaṁ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo bhojanassa kālo, tadañño vikāloti āha – “vikālabhojanāti kālātikkantabhojanā”ti.
tika-s0305t11:71: 1150.Yaṁ kiñci pupphanti ganthimaṁ aganthimaṁ vā yaṁ kiñci pupphajātaṁ, tathā pisitādibhedaṁ yaṁ kiñci gandhajātaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:74_1: 183) bhagavato sāsanaṁ accantachandarāgapavattito naccādīnaṁ dassanaṁ na anulometīti
tika-s0305t11:74_2: āha “sāsanassa ananulomattā”ti. Attanā parehi ca payojiyamānaṁ payojāpiyamānañca
tika-s0305t11:74_3: eteneva nacca-saddena gahitaṁ, tathā gītavāditasaddehi cāti āha – “naccananaccāpanādivasenā”ti.
tika-s0305t11:74_4: Ādi-saddena gāyana-gāyāpana-vādana-vādāpanādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Dassanena cettha savanampi
tika-s0305t11:74_5: saṅgahitaṁ virūpekasesanayena. Yathāsakaṁ visayassa ālocanasabhāvatāya vā pañcannaṁ
tika-s0305t11:74_7: gītassa savanaṁ kadāci vaṭṭatīti āha – “visūkabhūtā dassanā cā”ti. Tathā hi vuttaṁ
tika-s0305t11:76_0: 1152.Uccāti ucca-saddena samānatthaṁ ekaṁ saddantaraṁ. Seti etthāti sayanaṁ, uccāsayanaṁ
tika-s0305t11:76_2: Āsandādiāsanañcettha sayaneneva saṅgahitaṁ. Yasmā pana ādhāre paṭikkhitte tadādhārakiriyā
tika-s0305t11:76_3: paṭikkhittāva hoti, tasmā “uccāsayanamahāsayanā”icceva vuttaṁ. Atthato pana tadupabhogabhūtanisajjānipajjanehi
tika-s0305t11:76_4: virati dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Atha vā uccāsayanamahāsayanañca uccāsayanamahāsayanañcāti
tika-s0305t11:76_5: uccāsayanamahāsayananti etasmiṁ atthe ekasesanayena ayaṁ niddeso kato yathā – “nāmarūpapaccayā
tika-s0305t11:76_6: saḷāyatana”nti. Āsanakiriyāpubbakattā vā sayanakiriyāya sayanaggahaṇeneva āsanampi
tika-s0305t11:78_0: 1153. Aññepi uggahāpane upanikkhittasādiyane ca paṭiggahaṇattho labbhatīti āha –
tika-s0305t11:78_1: “na uggaṇhāpenti, na upanikkhittaṁ sādiyantī”ti. Atha vā tividhaṁ paṭiggahaṇaṁ kāyena
tika-s0305t11:78_2: vācāya manasāti. Tattha kāyena paṭiggahaṇaṁ uggahaṇaṁ, vācāya paṭiggahaṇaṁ uggahāpaṇaṁ,
tika-s0305t11:78_3: manasā paṭiggahaṇaṁ sādiyanaṁ. Tividhampi paṭiggahaṇaṁ sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesanayena
tika-s0305t11:78_4: vā gahetvā “paṭiggahaṇā”ti vuttanti āha – “neva naṁ uggaṇhantī”tiādi. Esa nayo “āmakadhaññapaṭiggahaṇā”tiādīsupi.
tika-s0305t11:82_0: 1155. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañca vasāni bhesajjāni – acchavasaṁ, macchavasaṁ, susukāvasaṁ,
tika-s0305t11:82_1: sūkaravasaṁ, gadrabhavasa”nti vuttattā idaṁ uddissa anuññātaṁ nāma. Tassa pana “kāle
tika-s0305t11:82_2: paṭiggahita”nti vuttattā paṭiggahaṇaṁ vaṭṭatīti āha – “aññatra uddissa anuññātā”ti.
tika-s0305t11:82_3: Vinayavasena upaparikkhitabbo, tasmā samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya vuttanayenettha
tika-s0305t11:85: 1162-63. Kassaci bhaṇḍassa gahaṇaṁ kayo, dānaṁ vikkayo. Tattha tatthāti gāmantare santike ca gamanaṁ dūtakammanti vuccatīti yojanā. Pahiṇagamanaṁ khuddakagamanaṁ.
tika-s0305t11:87_0: 1164.Rūpakūṭaṁ sarūpena sadisena chalavohāro. Aṅgakūṭaṁ attano hatthādinā aṅgānaṁ
tika-s0305t11:87_1: chalakaraṇaṁ. Gahaṇakūṭaṁ mānesu gahaṇavasena. Paṭicchannakūṭaṁ ayacuṇṇādinā paṭicchannena
tika-s0305t11:87_2: chalakaraṇaṁ. Mahatiyā tulāya. Pacchābhāgeti tulāya pacchimabhāge. Hatthenāti hatthapadesena.
tika-s0305t11:87_3: Akkamatīti uṭṭhātuṁ adento gaṇhāti. Dadanto pubbabhāgeti paresaṁ dadanto pubbabhāge
tika-s0305t11:88_1: suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karonti. Mānabhājanassa hadayabhūtassa abbhantarassa bhinnaṁ hadayabhedo.
tika-s0305t11:88_2: Nimiyamānassa tilataṇḍulādikassa sikhāya aggakoṭiyā bhinnaṁ sikhābhedo. Khettādīnaṁ
tika-s0305t11:88_3: minanarajjuyā aññathākaraṇaṁ rajjubhedo. Rajjugahaṇeneva cettha daṇḍakassa gahaṇaṁ
tika-s0305t11:90_1: hi vadha-saddo dissati “atthānaṁ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyyā”tiādīsu. Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ
tika-s0305t11:90_2: pana “māraṇa”nti vuttaṁ, taṁ pana pothanaṁ sandhāyāti sakkā viññātuṁ māraṇasaddassa
tika-s0305t11:95_1: samathavipassanāsu sammadeva yatanato ca yatīnaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ khandhāyatanadhātusaccindriyapaṭiccasamuppādabhede
tika-s0305t11:95_2: paramatthadhamme nānānayehi ñāṇavibhāgassa sannissayena bahukārassa saṁyuttāgamavarassa
tika-s0305t11:95_3: atthasaṁvaṇṇanaṁ kātuṁ sāratthappakāsanato eva nipuṇā yā mayā aṭṭhakathā āraddhāti
tika-s0305t11:95_4: sambandho. Savisesaṁ paññāvahaguṇattā eva hissa ganthārambhe āditopi “paññāpabhedajananassā”ti
tika-s0305t11:95_5: vuttaṁ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāya sāranti saṁyuttamahāaṭṭhakathāya sāraṁ. Ekūnasaṭṭhimattoti
tika-s0305t11:96_0: Mūlaṭṭhakathāya sāranti pubbe vuttasaṁyuttamahāaṭṭhakathāya sārameva puna nigamanavasena
tika-s0305t11:96_1: vuttanti. Atha vā mūlaṭṭhakathāya sāranti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu atthasāraṁ. Tena etaṁ
tika-s0305t11:96_2: dasseti “saṁyuttamahāaṭṭhakathāya atthasāraṁ ādāya imaṁ sāratthappakāsiniṁ karontena
tika-s0305t11:96_3: sesamahānikāyānampi mūlaṭṭhakathāsu idha viyogakkhamaṁ atthasāraṁ ādāya akāsi”nti.
tika-s0305t11:96_5: samayaṁ pakāsayantiṁ mahāvihārādhivāsīnaṁ mūlaṭṭhakathāya sāraṁ ādāyā”ti ca. Tena
tika-s0305t11:96_6: puññena. Hotu sabbo sukhī lokoti kāmāvacarādivibhāgo sabbo sattaloko yathārahaṁ bodhittayādhigamavasena
tika-s0305t11:96_7: sampayuttena nibbānasukhena sukhito hotūti sadevakassa lokassa accantaṁ sukhādhigamāya
